Main.heading: Words in Your Fulfillment
Main.description: Learn English with Yoko's user-generated texts

Collections.title: Collections
Collections.text: Welcome to our Collections section, where language learning meets creativity! Dive into a world of curated texts, carefully crafted to enhance your vocabulary. Browse through collections created by the community, or forge your path by crafting your own.
Collections.mobileText: Welcome to our Collections section, where language learning meets creativity! Dive into a world of curated texts, carefully crafted to enhance your vocabulary.

First.p: Discover a multitude of collections, each tailored to a specific theme or language level. From beginner basics to advanced nuances, there's something for everyone.
First.mobile: Discover a multitude of collections, each tailored to a specific theme or language level.

Second.p: Unleash your creativity by creating your collections. Share them with the world, or keep them private for your personal learning journey.
Second.mobile: Unleash your creativity by creating your collections.

Third.p: Tailor your learning experience by filtering collections based on name, popularity, or personal preferences. Stay organized and track your progress effortlessly.
Third.mobile: Stay organized and track your progress effortlessly.

Fourth.p: Connect with like-minded learners, exchange ideas, and grow together. Like and save your favorite collections to revisit them anytime..
Fourth.mobile: Connect with like-minded learners, exchange ideas, and grow together.

Ways.title: Modern Way of Learning
Ways.text: Experience a new era of language learning with our innovative methods designed to make learning engaging and effective.
Ways.mobileText: Experience a new era of language learning with our innovative methods designed to make learning engaging and effective.
Ways.firstText: Immerse yourself in the language by reading texts in English and Ukrainian. Simply hover over a word for its translation, making learning seamless and efficient.
Ways.firstMobileText: Immerse yourself in the language by reading texts in English and Ukrainian.
Ways.secondText: Test your knowledge with our interactive quizzes. Choose the correct translation for words in English, reinforcing your understanding and retention.
Ways.secondMobileText: Test your knowledge with our interactive quizzes.
Ways.thirdText: Revise vocabulary effortlessly with our interactive flashcards. See the word in English, then flip the card to reveal its translation, reinforcing your memory.
Ways.thirdMobileText: Revise vocabulary effortlessly with our interactive flashcards.
Ways.fourthText: Benefit from AI assistance to assess your English level. Engage in conversations with our AI chatbot to practice and receive feedback on your writing skills.
Ways.fourthSecondText: Practice speaking with our AI, which uses words from the collections you're studying. Get real-time feedback and improve your fluency and confidence. Enhance your learning experience with our modern tools and techniques. Start your journey to language mastery today!
Ways.fourthSecondMobileText: Practice speaking with our AI, which uses words from the collections you're studying. Get real-time feedback and improve your fluency and confidence.
Ways.fourthButtonText: Test your english level by AI

First.name: Monkey D. Luffy
First.content: I really like this app, it really helps to have fun and get smarter in my free time, although I install it to order food, though !

Third.name: Roronoa Zoro
Third.content: Something do happen, something that makes me smarter and in the same time gives me joy !

Fourth.name: Nami
Fourth.content: Now I switched from other couple of apps  and really cut my expenses over the time, but listen carefully ! this is my coupon...

Fifth.name: Tony Tony Chopper
Fifth.content: Now days it is hard to learn specific professional  vocabulary for, but this app is a real lifesaver

Sixth.name: Usopp
Sixth.content: I am not gonna lie that app is awesome !

Final.title: Join Our Community
Final.text: Become a part of our vibrant community of language learners! Share your knowledge, learn from others, and stay motivated on your language learning journey.

First.p: Collaborate with fellow learners to create unique collections, exchange ideas, and support each other's learning goals.

Second.p: Get inspired by success stories, language learning tips, and motivational content shared by our community members.

Third.p: Join us today and embark on a rewarding journey towards language fluency and cultural enrichment. Together, we can achieve our language learning goals!
Third.mobileP: Join us today and embark on a rewarding journey towards language fluency and cultural enrichment.

landing.title: Yoko
landing.description: Learn English through a diverse collection of texts in English and Ukrainian in Yoko. Improve your language skills with engaging content and bilingual support.

store.title: Store
store.description: Yoko's store page where you can find the best collections for learning English.
